release_note: Updated to fix issues such as iOS 17 adaptation.
Fixes an issue that could cause handwriting to be lost. Fixes an issue that could cause purchases to be restored.
Fixed the issue of text input crashes under iPadOS State Manager.
Support 2 new pen ink types under iPadOS 16.1. Fix the bug of the pop up menu under M2 iPad Pro. Fix the bug of copying text under OCR Pro. Fix the bug of iOS 12 startup crashes. Fix other bugs.
The offline OCR Pro engine is replaced with the Baidu engine which greatly improves the Chinese recognition rate without online correction.
Temporarily roll back the OCR engine to fix the crash issue after the previous version update.

Update the OCR engine greatly improve the offline Chinese recognition rate and achieve high recognition rate without online correction. Fix the issue that the picture colors is reversed in dark mode. Added Russian language recognition to OCR Pro. Fix bugs.

Automatic historical archive to prevent handwriting loss is added it will be triggered automatically when a large number of handwriting loss is detected in mindmap document and the notes before loss will be saved as history archive . Modify the reference mechanism to provide a safe reference mechanism. deleting a node will not affect other nodes that reference it and other reference nodes will automatically become clone nodes . Fix bug: Fix the problem that some title links in card comments are not displayed Fix crashing on open specific PDF Fix the problem of abnormal mindmap caused by merging the summary into the parent node Fix the display effect of dragging frame structure cards in the floating window and the problem of multiple selection of cards Fix the problem that frequently opening the card Editor could cause the Pencil Kit to crash.

Solve the issue of OCR online correction error. Solve the issue of crashing on constantly creating new windows. Solve the issue of PDF page drift caused by entering and exiting the editing state under the Bluetooth keyboard. Solve the issue where eraser could not take effect when switching focus.
Improvements and bug fixes.
Improvements and bug fixes.
Improvements and bug fixes
Fix the problem that handwriting of documents may cause App to crash.
Fixed some bugs in the previous versions.

Fix the problem that when a data conflict occurs during notebook synchronization the wrong data may be reversely synchronized to the cloud. Solve some problems caused by the last version update Fix some other bugs.

Feature update: Adding Removing pdf page implemented by virtualization technology can add book pages from pictures and other PDFs more quickly and safely. Add a review setting: the entire card as the front of the card by default. Add a handwriting setting: Allow focus handwriting to be displayed globally. Fix the bug.

Fixed some bugs. Support for backing up and restoring all data through iTunes previously only documents were supported now documents all note data are supported . Support the reorder of child minmaps. Support adding child mindmaps directly on the card. A new screen casting method that supports full screen mode. The mindmap handwriting in the focus mode will be hidden by default outside the mind map. Fix bugs and performance optimization.

Fix the BUG of the previous version. Support for backing up and restoring all data through iTunes previously only documents were supported now documents all note data are supported . Support the reorder of child minmaps. Support adding child mindmaps directly on the card. A new screen casting method that supports full screen mode. The mindmap handwriting in the focus mode will be hidden by default outside the mind map. Fix bugs and performance optimization.

Support adding child mindmaps directly on the card. A new screen casting method that supports full screen mode. The mindmap handwriting in the focus mode will be hidden by default outside the mind map. Fix bugs and performance optimization.

In PencilKit handwriting mode you can try custom toolbars non native . In PencilKit handwriting mode customized toolbar pen clone is supported. In PencilKit handwriting mode the Always type is added to the straight line mode to remove the delay time. Provide a hiding method for handwriting in focus note. The toolbar provides independent entry for the text box picture box. Supports pasting text and pictures into the document text box picture box . In the multi selected state of the deck all notes can be set to the front of the card. When dragging multiple pictures into the mind map it is changed to enter as a child node. Added a setting to turn off the auxiliary toolbar when keyboard input. A demo mode option has been added to the settings. Originally needed to open the function through URL Scheme Support the removal of documents associated with the mind map from the mind map and tabs. The search in the research cancels the use of instead of spaces. Support PageUp PageDown button to turn the book. An option has been added to the handwriting toolbar: Allow the mind map and the document to not turn on off handwriting at the same time. Synchronized by default An option has been added to the handwriting toolbar double click to enter the handwriting focus which is not entered by default . Fix the problem that PencilKit automatically cancels the eraser under the custom toolbar . Fixed several bugs in video excerpts. Fixed an issue where PK handwriting occupies a lot of RAM and easily crashes. Fixed a crash in multi window conditions. Fix the issue of Undo Redo causing abnormal loss of handwriting.

Support PencilKit MindMap handwriting and MindMap node position binding. Improve MindMap focus mode to facilitate the association of MindMap handwriting with the nodes of MindMap. Support Undo Redo PencilKit handwriting on MN toolbar. Support the idea box display effect of 3.6 by dragging child MindMap into the parent node. For documents lost in notebooks no longer occupy Tab page position. Fix the PencilKit handwriting loss issue. Fix some bugs.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Mind map handwriting layer adjustment setting. The card review adds the option of whether to mask the highlighter emphasis. Supports backing up single multiple documents and folders and all their associated notes as marginpkg package. Fix BUGs.
Fix the problem that PencilKit drawings sometimes drifts. Fix the problem that PencilKit drawings is very blurry when exporting PDF. Fix other bugs of the previous version.

In this update we have revamped the mindmap notebooks in MarginNote. We have improved idea boxes and renamed them to child mindmaps. We ve added a mindmap list interface to better present the child mindmaps and added support for writing directly on the mindmap via Apple PencilKit. Now each child mindmap looks like an infinitely large paper where you can assign a topic to and take your notes on. Thanks to the mindmap list that we ve added you can now easily switch between different child mindmaps and quickly locate the topic you want. Apple Pencil is no longer limited to writing and drawing: in MarginNote 3.7 you can excerpt text link your notes and organize your mindmaps with it. The title link feature now works with child mindmaps and bookmarked focuses yes focuses can now be bookmarked . Thanks to this update you no longer need to create separate notebooks for your title link dictionaries. Besides the features mentioned above we have also added collaboration via iCloud temporary reference mode to view other files in your database and many more. we also added the following features: Collaboration: in the mindmap menubar by tapping on the more settings Cooperate you will be able to share a notebook with your friends and work on it with them. Temporary Reference Mode in Search: MarginNote allows searching through all the documents in your database regardless of whether they are in your current notebook. Previously if you clicked on the search result from a document that was not in your database MarginNote would direct you to the notebook that the document was in. With this update the document would instead be opened as a temporary tab in the document section of your mindmap notebook. If you take no notes from the document it will be automatically closed after you leave it. If you take some notes from that document it will be bound to your notebook and become a permanent file in the notebook. Filtering the Cards that Haven t Been Added to the Mindmap: now you can filter the cards that haven t been added to the mindmap using colors and tags. Through this you can easily find the important notes that you want to analyze and place them into the mindmap. Universal Occlusion for Highlighting: now the highlights you make using the highlighter in your documents mindmaps and outlines could be used as occlusions in flashcards in review mode.
Fix the UI problem of iPhone 12 series. Fix the PDF cropping issue in the previous version. Hope this is the last version before 3.7.
Fix the bug of the highlighter on iPad Air4. Fix several crash issues. Solve the performance problem when there are too many document tabs. Forecast: the next version should be 3.7.

Fix several bugs of the previous version UI. Recently updated: Fix the issue that custom fonts are not supported on iOS 14. Fix handwriting errors in card editing on iOS 14. Fix the export error of MindManager format. Fix the problem of hyphenation when extracting English texts. Fix the problem that italics cannot be set when editing excerpts. Fix the problem that the font cannot be directly set for excerpts and comments. Fix the text box color problem. Fix the problem of disappearing and crashing of the picture frame. Fix some bugs reported by other users.

Fixed the issue that many users were experiencing with not being able to cloud sync or the cloud sync was very slow. Fixed the issue where links on some PDF pages were not clickable.

Bug fixes and improvements: When removing associated documents if the documents have excerpts related to the mindmap the removal operation will be prohibited. Added an option to turn off the function of automatically starting online correction when an error occurs in offline OCR. Fixed the situation that the input is sometimes covered by the soft keyboard when inputting the text box. Fixed a bug that would appear when dragging and dropping to the reference node on the mindmap. Fixed some consistency bugs in creating links inside and outside the idea box. Fixed an issue that always prompts a dialog box when locating an excerpt in an inspiration box on a document. Fixed a performance issue when the annotation text was too long. Modified the entrance of the idea box function.

Bug fixes and improvements for 3.6.12 Update 3.6.12 Major upgrade of MindMap : support idea box function. A MindMap can be divided into multiple independent MindMap spaces. Note reference : Unlike the clone function the reference note card can be synchronized with the original note content but it can have an independent logical structure. Anki export major upgrade: support custom templates. Optimize OCR Pro s automatic correction fix bugs and optimize layout. Optimize the UI of text color setting during text input. Fix other bugs.

Major upgrade of MindMap : support idea box function. A MindMap can be divided into multiple independent MindMap spaces. Anki export major upgrade: support custom templates. Optimize OCR Pro s automatic correction fix bugs and optimize layout. Optimize the UI of text color setting during text input. Fix other bugs.
Fix some issues of the previous version update.
OCR Pro update fix BUG optimize performance optimize online correction function update ABBYY engine Optimize backup and recovery functions. Fixed some serious bugs in previous versions.

Two new note editing extensions are supported: Markdown Formulas Tables Flowcharts Pictures etc. Support for automatic extension updates. Support for cursors for video presentations. Switch by marginnote3app: touchpose 1 or marginnote3app: touchpose 0 Support for clearing format information of notes. BUG fixes. Fixed the eraser bug. Fixed the problem of mindmap font size. Supports mouse and Trackpad iOS 13.4 . Support modify fonts and colors of excerpt part of note. Support URL scheme in note. Optimized auto insertion position in MindMap. Added entry to modify MindMap insertion options. Support Auto sync excerpt to title in the excerpt settings. Optimized PDF export and rectangle excerpt function of MarginNote PDF engine. Fixes and Improvements: Keyword matching in Title Link supports automatic removal of emoji numeric serial numbers and matching plural forms of English words. A button has been added to the pop up box of the Title Link to search for keywords in notes. Use the built in scanner from iOS 13 for adding pictures to PDFs and cards through the camera. Fixed drag and drop of research window. Fixed the problem that epub cannot display pictures. Fixed the incorrect order of playing flashcards. Provide a method to optimize handwritten data generated before 3.6.5 which can improve loading speed. In Safari enter: marginnote3app: upgradedb_stroke 0 Fixed other bugs crashes. 3.6 Improvements Title Link. Highly recommended to researchers and students New handwriting engine accelerated using Metal technology. Support partial erase mode. Support for inserting pictures on PDF pages. Supports selecting and excerpting with your finger in Apple Pencil writing mode. Supports custom adding multiple pen shapes and free switching. Updated examples and guides.

Improve the data synchronization mechanism to prevent users from seeing and editing the chaotic mindmap during synchronization causing data errors. Improved synchronization security. Before synchronizing major changes to the note data it will be backed up in the historical archive. Fixed the issue of undoing a large number of notes at once when undoing handwritings. Improve the security of database defragmentation. Avoid accidental data loss. Other bug fixes

Features: Video playback allows you to swipe directly on the video to control progress. Added a quick video clip button. Repair and improvement: Adjusted the speed rating setting for video playback. BUG of video and audio excerpts when exporting to Anki. Fixed a bug when adding a picture with a rotation direction. Fixed some bugs when notes were added to the deck. Features: Supports direct drag and drop content to excerpts within the document. Only PDF Video Support for direct links between document excerpts. Only PDF Video Supports displaying marginal notes when the document in study mode is full screen. Support MP3 M4A documents. Supports displaying a control bar during card video playback. BUG: Fix the bug when the pen was switched since the previous update. Fix sort of the outline by page number. Fix bugs in split window resizing. Fix bugs that remove tags.
This version fixes some crash issues. Support for oblique line pens. Fix drawing errors caused by pen switching. Fix bugs in tag deletion.

This version will upgrade the database which will significantly improve loading and paging performance. Improved power consumption caused by syncing iCloud notes. You can view results only from one single document or notebook during a global search. Fixed the performance issue when reviewing cards. Fixed an issue with pen width in drawing. Fixed an issue with the album crashing after the last version update. Fixed an issue with crashing in editing. Fixed some UI bugs for document synchronization.

Added mindmap outline card edit begin exit shortcut key: Command Enter support UP DOWN shortcut key to switch between notes in editing. Supports exporting videos to GIF when Evernote is exported. Support crop blank settings saved in the notebook can be backed up and synchronized. Fixed some bugs and crashes from the previous version. Ver 3.3: Updated user guide. The guide organizes some material in the form of a MarginNote MindMap including an article by a blogger and some operational guidance videos. Support Summary organization function in MindMap. Support Video Documents for video excerpts and support export to Anki. Optimized some features and fixed some bugs.

This release updates the user guide and some features Updated user guide. The guide organizes some material in the form of a MarginNote MindMap including an article by a blogger and some operational guidance videos. Support Summary organization function in MindMap. Support Video Documents for video excerpts and support export to Anki. Optimized some features and fixed some bugs.

Problem fixing: Fixed an issue where the emphasis was lost when modifying the excerpt range. Fixed an error in searching or reading certain PDF documents due to internal code errors. Improve the way the document Tab is displayed in the Study mode. Fixed a crash issue with some PDF documents open. Fix bugs in global search notes in document mode.
Fix frequent crashes after the last update 3.2.7 This problem is caused by compiled by the newest compiler 10.2 this version is temporarily returned to 10.1

BUG fix: Fixed critical BUG: PDF and EPUB with uppercase extensions cannot be opened since last update. Fixed card deck sorting issues. Fixed sorting problem of exporting Anki cards . Fixed crash issues on selecting text on some pdfs. Functional improvements: Added the ability to add MP3 files to notes. Support for adding pictures and audio to the front of the card. Supports the ability to keep annotations when deleting a MindMap notebook. Supports the ability to keep annotations when removing documents from MindMap notebook. Delete the associated card while deleting the note. Improved question setting for flashcard.
This update mainly fixes several serious performance and data security issues.

Feature improvements: Support search view to switch between split view and popover view. Support review mode can easily switch to document and study mode and switch back. Support newly added documents to automatically add to iCloud will prompt users when the size is too large. Support card zoom in review mode. Improved the problem of large power consumption during handwriting. Fix BUG: Fixed an issue where some images could not be displayed when Anki was exported. Fixed Anki s ability to export multiple image occlusion to generate multiple card features. Fixed sync failure caused by iCloud sync when some notes were too large. Fixed a bug of drawing select in card edit.

Fix a series of problems caused by handwriting text box across pages. Fix bugs in PDF export in document mode. Fix the problem of link deletion. Fix the problem that the excerpt added in the offline state cannot be automatically OCR after online. Fix UI bugs.
Support to rectangle select handwritings then Move Zoom Delete. Improve TextBox feature. Improve Lasso feature. Improve for all screen devices. Bug fixes.

Drag and Drop unadded notes into MindMap. Card review : random sort mode. Fixed problems with PDF text selection and extraction. Fixed Apple pencil writing problem. Fixed iPhone splash screen issue. Fixed an issue where OCR could not be used due to SpotLight initialization. Fixed crashing when emptying the trash. Fixed the problem that the card review interface is easy to crash.

Fix the crashes issues of version 3.2 update. 3.2 Feature Update: SpotLight Integration All notes docs tags . Support many filters of flashcards in CardDeck: Document Hashtag Due Starred Score. Support change sort mode of flashcards in CardDeck. Support for starring flashcards. Global notes search in Study mode. Drag to link or copy from global search results. Float MindMap View to show the links of MindMap node. Siri shortcuts donations. Improved Handoff. Improved Webpage to PDF. Support Upload a single folder to iCloud. And with many other improvements bug fixes.

Feature Update: SpotLight Integration All notes docs tags . Support many filters of flashcards in CardDeck: Document Hashtag Due Starred Score. Support change sort mode of flashcards in CardDeck. Support for starring flashcards. Global notes search in Study mode. Drag to link or copy from global search results. Float MindMap View to show the links of MindMap node. Siri shortcuts donations. Improved Handoff. Improved Webpage to PDF. Support Upload a single folder to iCloud. And with many other improvements bug fixes.

Important improvements: Support for importing web pages in PDF format. Web pages in the research function can be saved as PDF. Support for sending web pages directly from Safari to MarginNote 3. Supports quick switching between Document mode and Study mode. Other improvements: Improved Apple pencil 2 generation double click function switch to the previous tool . Optimize pop up menu location during excerpts. Fixed an issue when clicking on overlapping excerpts. Improvements to App Trial. Rate and Review. Speech excerpts. Fix crashes and improve stability.
Fix the critical issue of File Management. Improvements Bug fixes.

New Features: Speech in Document Study mode auto OCR excerpts for speech. Multi select to modify colors and tags in document mode. Improvements: Manual Sync. Setting for PDF double page mode. Setting for floating research view. Export whole backup as an Apple document package. Adjustments for Outline fonts. Performance optimization. Fix bugs in last update.

Major updates: Significantly improved Research feature. Support Speech mode during Review. Support Double Page for PDF in Horizontal Flip View. Second generation Apple Pencil adaptation corresponding actions can be modified in iOS settings . Support Backup Notes Database All Documents. Details: Research Browser Customization Answering to our users feature request MarginNote 3 now supports research engine customization. 1. Dictionary 2. Text Search 3. Scholar Search New 4. Question Search 5. Image Search 6. Translate 7. PDF Search New New Scholar Search Entry Adding a new scholar entry in the research browser so that students and scholars using MarginNote 3 can have easier access to finding citation and book info needed. If set as Google it supports Google account log in so that you can star save the citation entry for future references. New PDF Research Entry This new entry aims to create a shortcut for users to search PDF files downloading and automatically adding to the Notebook at hand. Wikipedia Input Language Setting Wikipedia now supports setting input language as auto depending on the text content or as the system language on your iOS device. More Dictionary Options Adding to the current Wikipedia line is new support for Oxford Wikitionary Baidu and Eudic 2nd Generation Apple Pencil Support Support for the double tap gesture Can change actions in iOS Settings app

New Feature: Remove from MindMap. like MN2 hide Force iCloud sync notebook. Can transfer document notes when document is added to a Study. Can make cloze on picture imported. Fast switch document tab in study mode. Support non excerpt color on Outline exporting OmniOutliner Word . Not always create new note types when export to Anki. Optimization: Optimized dark mode. Adjust MindMap display style. Optimized for all screen devices. Change translate engine back to Google Only China . Fixed some bugs UI issues.

Fix translation research in China. Fix apple pencil drawing issue. Support multi select cards in card deck. Enable hand off in iOS 12 by default. Fix the issue that handwriting can not be exported into Anki. Fix other bugs.

Solved the problem of crashing or white screen when flipping pages quickly. Solved the problem that UI mass on clicking notes on the document in the review mode. In the Study mode the card editing interface supports left and right sliding to switch notes.
Solve the crashing of clicking the More button in the upper right corner on the iPhone. Solve the problem that other language devices always display Chinese.

Solve the problem that the background OCR repeatedly pops up failed message when there is no network connection. Solve the UI and Crash issues introduced in the previous version. The floating view option has been added to the note editing view. Shortcut keys are added and adjusted.

Folder directory management: Supports folder management of all documents Supports synchronization of folder directory structure with iCloud. Support for direct access and management of documents in the Files app. accessed via My iPad iPhone OCR: By default the text in the rectangle excerpt and the lasso excerpt is recognized for the note search without changing the picture form of the note. All the rectangles and lasso excerpts added since 3.1 can be searched. Support for forced OCR which can be used to obtain correct text information using OCR correction even if the PDF contains text information but the text is wrong. Support other languages such as Japanese and Korean. Outline: Support for editing in non full screen small view mode. Adjust the conflict between outline slide in out gestures and outline indent edit gestures. iCloud: Support to select all the documents to upload iCloud or you can upload all the documents in a folder separately. Other function adjustments and improvements: Supports selection of text or area one click excerpts and merges into specified notes. Add excerpts to MindMap now support select all . Support Cmd X Cmd V shortcuts cut and paste . Note cards support full screen sketch. Support to export one card for multi image occlusions when exporting image occlusion. Add copy note URL in note sharing.
Fix document sync crash. Modified the display style of sketch on note card. Accurate record page position in vertical scroll mode. Fix bugs in the note sharing feature.
Fixed an issue that the eraser do not work since last update. Tap to toggle occlusion of transparent handwritings in recall mode. Small adjustments to the note UI.

1. Note Edit Document Mode Adding image text directly as new note. Drag and drop it to the right margin panel. Excerpt edit Supports direct pencil sketch on book excerpts. Mindmap Supports add child nodes in Title Only mode of MindMap. Toolbar Add a new Add to comments feature in highlight toolbar. Toolbar Improved the Set as Title feature 2. Annotation Mark Pen When Recall Emphasis as Cloze is on book text marked by Mark Pen will now display as being clozed . Text marked by Mark Pen will automatically forms an occlusion in card review. Support sync with Anki. 3. Miscellaneous Shortcut Left and right arrows under the outline re modified to expand or collapse the hierarchy. No jumping to the deck when notes are added to it. 4. Bug Fix Fixed an issue with Apple pencil writing. Fixed an issue where dragging child nodes in the MindMap sometimes messed up. Fixed an issue with exporting outline pdf in focus mode. Fixed BUG for PDF cropping for long pdf .

Fix the UI bug of last update. Support for importing PDF Annotations. Functional improvement Support for sorting the title of books notebooks on the shelf Support for book notebook list mode on the shelf Support ballpoint pen shape Apple pencil pressure sensitivity optimization Review card support showing note sublinks Support for modifying the entire branch to a framework or tree mode UI Support toolbar does not obscure the top of the page switch toolbar is hidden Toolbar supports Redo button Improved UI for editing text font colors Improved UI for adding note tags Modified UI for recall emphasis mode Modified UI for exporting mindmap branches Bug fix Automatic OCR bug Anki export order problem Anki exports a problem with double colons
